settings.title: Param√®tres
settings.subtitle: Modify app's configuration here
settings.sync_speed: Changes the synchronization interval of devices (in seconds)
settings.delay: Modifies the delay between a request for a change of state and the return of device status (in seconds)
settings.delay_recom: Recommended : 5 seconds (depends on your internet connection)
settings.count_message: That value is important because if your number of requests is above 500/day the application may not work anymore.
settings.send: Changes the delay between the user action and the actual sending of the order to the Legrand API (in seconds)
